title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
quoteText: You agree to indemnify, defend (if we so request) and hold harmless Moovweb and its affiliates, suppliers, partners and agents from and against any claim, demand, losses, damages or expenses (including reasonable attorney's fees) arising from your User Content, your use of the Site, your connection to the Site, your violation of these Terms or your violation of any rights of any third party.
